text: Articulation goals
will decrease tongue protrusion.
will improve labial seal at rest.
will properly articulate lingual alveolar sounds (/t, d, n/) by decreasing tongue protrusion.
will decrease final consonant deletion in conversation.
will decrease velar assimilation by producing CVC words.
will increase intelligibility while producing 3–4-word utterances.
will increase intelligibility in conversation.
will request and answer questions with increased intelligibility.
will say a story with increased intelligibility.
will increase overall intelligibility in conversation.
Will auditorily discriminate …
Will label common nouns with increased intelligibility.
will label common actions with increased intelligibility.
will say a story with increased articulatory precision.
will increase overall articulatory precision in conversation.
